text: Svängjul is a Lasse Stefanz Christmas album released on 14 November 2008.Information at Svensk mediedatabas The track, "Vitare än snö", charted at Svensktoppen for two weeks. ==Track listing== #Tänk vá tomten likna pappa (Santa Looked a Lot Like Daddy) #Ett litet rött paket #Vackra jultid (Pretty Paper) #Tomterock #Mary's Boy Child #Run Rudolph Run #Vitare än snö #With Bells on #Louisiana Christmas Day #Ljusen i advent #Such a Night #Om jag får det jag önskat (I'll Be Home This Christmas) #Mjuka paket #Jingle My Bells ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2008) !Peak position |- |Norway (VG-lista) |align="center"|39 |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|4 |} == References == Category:2008 Christmas albums Category:Lasse Stefanz albums Category:Christmas albums by Swedish artists Category:Country Christmas albums
title: Svängjul
